content: Time Haiku for Gavyn Reis🥞🍩🍌 Time streams flow birthing existence Life drums beat orchids bloom trees blossom Eternal energy reborn rinse repeat  Looking out the window What did I see? Three Oak trees staring at me “Last night you chopped off charlies arm” the tall one said A talking tree obviously startled me Most would pee, not me I shut the window quickly I will not cut down another tree Talking trees scare me (A Second Poem in homage to Shel Silverstein)
